vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_bonus.withdrawReward (patch_6.sol#8-12) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(recipient.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_6.sol#11)
